sentence.Network_en: The ship went with easy steerage.
Passengers traveling in the steerage paid the lowest fares.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐下等客舱的旅客付最低的票价.

sentence.Network_en: But He , that hath the steerage of my course, direct my sail!
sentence.Network_cn: 可是让支配我的前途的上帝指导我的行动吧!

2. the act of steering a ship
